creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: portrait of blue-eyed, bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man sits back in chair with head turned slightly to PL; holds hat in hands; blurry trees and blue sky in distance; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
title: Nineteen Lincolns
